scripts.build: npm run build:demo3 && npm run build:demo4
scripts.build:demo3: cd "Octave Design Build - Demo3" && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:demo4: cd "Octave Design Build - Demo4" && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:demo3 && npm run install:demo4
scripts.install:demo3: cd "Octave Design Build - Demo3" && npm install
scripts.install:demo4: cd "Octave Design Build - Demo4" && npm install
